hero.title: Meet Our Team
hero.description: Discover the dedicated student developers behind this innovative AI education platform and our collaborative journey in building this class project.

aboutTeam.title:
About Our
Team
descriptions: We are a passionate group of computer science students working together to deliver an innovative AI education platform as our class project. Our diverse team combines fresh perspectives with cutting-edge web development skills to create an engaging learning experience that bridges theoretical knowledge with practical application.

From frontend developers crafting intuitive user interfaces to backend engineers building robust systems, every team member brings unique skills and creativity to this collaborative effort. We've embraced modern development practices, version control workflows, and agile methodologies to deliver a professional-grade educational platform within our academic timeline.

What drives us is the challenge of creating something meaningful while learning and growing as developers. Through countless hours of coding, debugging, and iterating, we've built not just a platform, but also invaluable teamwork and technical skills. This project represents our dedication to excellence and our ability to transform ideas into reality through collaborative software development.

steps.title: Planning & Design
steps.description: We started by researching user needs, creating wireframes, and establishing our tech stack to build a comprehensive learning platform.

steps.title: Development & Testing
steps.description: Through collaborative coding sessions and code reviews, we implemented features, fixed bugs, and ensured our platform met quality standards.

steps.title: Deployment & Iteration
steps.description: We deployed our application, gathered feedback, and continuously improved the platform through multiple iterations and releases.

gallery.title:
Our Development
Journey
gallery.description: Moments of collaboration, problem-solving, and achievement as we built this platform together.
